reviewText: Wife loves these movies.  Prompt delivery and well packaged.

This was a real good value for a blu-ray movie combination.
 I was skeptical at first and almost didn't buy it thinking maybe it wasn't really blu-ray. It was in fact, blue ray though.

Bought this to watch with my girlfriend. I'm a guy, so obviously I'm mad about her. The Notebook turned out really sweet and seems like all the crazy, sappy things I'd do for her. The Lucky One is ok, but just wasn't for me. I averaged out the respective 5 and 3 star ratings to get the 4.
To great movies for a very low price. My only complaint is the don't have digital hd copies included but still 5 stars because no where did it say it included them in this sale.

Always loved The Notebook, and I must say I really enjoyed Lucky One too.
Thanks so much
My wife loves Nicholas Sparks, so this set scored me some brownie points.
Two great movies, haven't tried them yet, but I will.
THE NOTEBOOK IS A VERY GOOD MOVIE I CAN NOT STOP WATCHING IT ON BLU RAY THE PICTURE AND SOUND IS JUST AWESOME!!!! LUCKY ONE IS OKAY I GOT TWO FOR ONE COMBO SET. 5 STARS FOR THIS SELLER.  THANK YOU
The notebook won't play all the way thru...the lucky ones was good tho
There was a dent in the case and a tare in the paper. Other then that it was perfect! :)

Alright men, this is how you earn those points with the woman in your life.  You buy this double Blu-ray of the Notebook and The Lucky One, and agree to sit down and watch it with her.  Throw in a bottle of wine; maybe some cheese, crackers, grapes, jelly, smoked sausage, etc., and you have a well planned evening that if it doesn't end the way you hoped (and you should know what I'm saying here!!!!!) then you need to take lessons, or see professional help, cause it doesn't get any easier than this.  And by the way, you do this on a Saturday evening, and not only will you get to watch the game on Sunday, uninterrupted, she'll probably make you a sandwich!
Have always loved The Notebook. The Lucky One was new to me but a good one as well.
Love The Notebook.  The Lucky One was alright but for the price paid for these 2 movies on Blu Ray, you can't go wrong.
There's no other movie like the Notebook. Get it!
It was a great gift to give.
Love these movies and finally happy I own them now on Bluray
My fiance loves The Notebook, anytime it's on TV she has to watch it. And we've been watching other Nicholas Sparks movies and she really likes The lucky one so I had to get this for her birthday.
The Lucky One - great reading. You will fall in love with Logan! Music is excellent also.
Thanks for 2 great classics in one, great price. Arrived quickly
I love the Notebook, The Lucky One was a nice bonus.
